item.title: My Vscode Config Tips
item.description: Plugins React https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/reactjs-tutorial cppTools get started https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-cpptools/blob/master/Documentation/Getting%20started.md mingw setups https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-cpptools/blob/master/Documentation/LanguageServer/MinGW.md debug https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-cpptools/blob/master/launch.md vs c++ team blog https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2017/06/27/visual-studio-code-cc-extension-june-2017-update/

item.title: Unix Network Commands
item.description: traceroute wait time 3s, send 1 query for each, max hop is 16. So stop at the 16th query to map out network layout. traceroute -w 3 -q 1 -m 16 blog.hurryduckling.com
